label: 懐風藻
対訳語: Yearnings for the Ancient Chinese Style
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 53rd  . Nara National Museum . 2001
説明文: A Nara-period one-book collection of Chinese-style poems compiled in 751. Includes 120 selections. Though heavily influenced by Chinese models and lacking in individual expression, it is the first collection of Chinese poetry published in Japan.
